document.full_text: an ivy league-trained doctor-turned-stock-picker has been charged with insider trading, accused of showering a french physician with cash and a luxury trip to new york in exchange for secret details on a biotechnology company.
document.title: doctor-turned-trader paid cash for stock tips
lines_and_colors: an ivy league-trained doctor-turned-stock-picker has been charged with insider trading, accused of showering a french physician with cash and a luxury trip to new york in exchange for secret details on a biotechnology company.
